name: Boss Clicker
description:
Click and win!

Boss Clicker- a fascinating clicker with RPG elements in which you need to “clicked» everybody, who try to mislead you. You think, they will allow insult themselves and simply give you treasure chest?
Oh, no! They will do everything to stop you: invoke terrible rockfalls and deadly storms, demons from the impenetrable darkness, or subordinate Elements . Give them fight back and show what you can!
- RPG and IDLE In one game
- 23 unique bosses, each of which precisely will not get bored.
- Multiple game modes.
— More than 100 levels of difficulty for the boss!
— Nonlinear development!
— Win all bosses and think that's the end?
Not so fast! In the Elite Mode and Uber Modes bosses will be much stronger and more tenacious, so get ready to click faster and more!
Mode Arena of Heroes - only the strongest players!
— A singular mode Adventures also will not get bored. Endless mode, which will show you exactly who is better!
— A quantity of achievements. Complete and receives a decent reward.
— Big set of weapons. Increase your damage and give a fitting rebuff to adversary.
— Mercenaries. One sword is good, but the army behind you better!
— A system of crafting. Do you want the best weapon in the game? Refine treasures from defeated bosses in the magic keys, that will help you create a deadly weapon!

Dreamed about the RPG Сlicker? This is the best variant)
Well. Buy weapons, hire troops of mercenaries and go to victory!
